title: LoyceV
author: LoyceV
created_time: December 09, 2023, 06:20:36 PMLast edit: December 09, 2023, 06:32:26 PM by LoyceV
content: It's been a while since I've created a Merit topic, and this topic suggested something new: Merit earned on deleted or short posts.DisclaimerEarning Merit for posts that get deleted later isn't necessarily a bad thingEarning Merit for short posts isn't necessarily a bad thingI can't access posts on hidden (Mod) boards. Those count as "deleted". I did include InvestigationsI consider posts with less than 16 characters to be short posts. In most cases, this means the user wiped the content of his post, but this can have false positives, or false negatives (it's tricky to check the real post length with BBCode and Russian characters, and short posts (including memes) can be worth Merit)I only checked users who earned at least 100 MeritI scraped this data in the past few weeks. That means totals can be a tad off from the current totalI tried to make up for failed scraping due to forum downtimeI won't do regular updates. If you really want it, ask me in about 5 yearsI won't do any other sorting than the current orderI created links to all short posts. Replace "html" in the URL by "txt" to download BBCode for the forum.The links are labeled with the number of Merit each post received. If you sort the directory by file size, many WO-regulars are on top.The list (it's a long scroll, click the link to see all Merited short posts):satoshi received 1/5878=0.01% Merit for deleted posts
